name: YourTransformationStation
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Listen to weekly updates from Your Transformation Station. 

You can just say "Alexa, play Your Transformation Station". You can say "Alexa, stop" to exit anytime.

Your Transformation Station features long form interviews that gives you authentic, unfiltered, and intelligent content so that you can start assuming leadership. Apple's Top 200 Business News Podcast, features your voice, Gregory Favazza, Army veteran, author, and baccalaureate of Science in Organizational Leadership.

Here, everything connects and giving you actionable advice is what you will get. We'll explore levels behavioral modification, social stratification and wellness.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
